swap-colors.name: Swap Colors
swap-colors.description:
Swaps the use of P1 and P2 colors for tinting the fireBoost sprite. 

If enabled, uses P2 for the outer part and P1 for the inner part.

customization-title.name: Customization
customization-title.description: Customize the Fire Boost a little further!

use-custom-colors.name: Use Custom Colors
use-custom-colors.description: Use custom colors for the fireBoost sprite, instead of using your Player Colors!

custom-col1.name: Color 1
custom-col1.description:
The main color to use for the Fire Boost sprite. 

This color is used for the *outer* part of the fire.

custom-col2.name: Color 2
custom-col2.description:
The secondary color to use for the Fire Boost sprite. 

This color is used for the *inner* part of the fire.

custom-colwhite.name: Extra Color
custom-colwhite.description:
The Extra color to use for the Fire Boost Sprite. 

This color is used for the middle part of the fire sprite, and is ***heavily recommended*** to keep as White (as this is the color used in the vanilla sprite).
